mapper.select: select record.* ,prtSysEntity.path as parentEntityPath ,prtSysEntity.name as parentEntityName ,relatedField.assignment_code as relatedFieldCode ,parentDataField.assignment_code as parentDataFieldCode from sys_relation as record left join sys_entity as prtSysEntity on prtSysEntity.id = record.parent_entity_id left join sys_field as relatedField on relatedField.id = record.related_field_id left join sys_field as parentDataField on parentDataField.id = record.parent_data_field_id where record.sub_entity_id = #{record.id} and record.is_delete = 0
